column3: Should we confirm the checksums of `osslsigncode-Backports-to-1.7.1.patch` and `osslsigncode-1.7.1.tar.gz` too?
If they are not checked, https isn't going to help either.
Yes, ideally we should have both: checksumming to make sure we get the data we expect and TLS to avoid leaking our request to eavesdroppers (beyond leaking the hostname).
